text: Donald Trump's plan to seize Venezuela oil industry after Nicolas Maduro captured faces major hurdles - ABC7 Los Angeles
fullText: President Donald Trump's plan to take control of Venezuela's oil industry and ask American companies to revitalize it after capturing President Nicolás Maduro in a raid isn't likely to have a significant immediate impact on oil prices.

text: New 'super scary’ fungus already detected in Connecticut, experts warn - CT Insider
fullText: Candida auris was first discovered in 2009, with the first clinical case identified in 2016. Since then, the fungus has spread to nearly every state in the U.S.

text: Trump wants U.S. oil companies in Venezuela. Here's what to know - NPR
fullText: President Trump wants more U.S. oil companies to "go in" to Venezuela. But there are economic, historical, and climate reasons that may not be easy. Here's what you need to know about oil in Venezuela.

text: Nick Emmanwori Shines In Dominant Defensive Performance As Seahawks Top 49ers - Seattle Seahawks

text: Leonardo DiCaprio Backs Cinema, While Kylie Jenner Cheers Timothée Chalamet - Variety

text: Bucs Run Over Panthers, Keep NFC South Title in Play - Tampa Bay Buccaneers
fullText: In a steady rain, the Buccaneers controlled the line of scrimmage and outrushed Carolina by 121 yards to hold on for a 16-14 win that kept them in contention for a division title depending upon Sunday's Saints-Falcons tilt
